title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Workshop on Research Group Learning Experience Design for Graduate Engineering Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze research group learning environments using participatory observation and qualitative research methods
Learners can explain four core competencies (presentation, feedback acceptance/response, problem-solving, troubleshooting) that enhance learning experiences for engineering graduate students
Learners can design activities (e.g., meeting facilitation, structured feedback) that promote interaction in small research groups

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
